value.title: Analyze days from two months on one line chart in Power BI
value.excerpt: Have you struggled to compare data from two different time periods in Power BI? Does the data just continue on and not overlap? Patrick shows you how you can easily overlay the data for comparison.  Download sample: https://guyinacu.be/twomonthssample  üì¢ Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership

value.title: Enable QUERY FOLDING for native queries in Power Query / Power BI
